评论详情: I now own 7 pairs of these and I’m ordering more. Great duty and daily wear. These pants are a great fit around the waist, and I have never had a single issue with the pockets or them shrinking. The inside button doesn’t have to be reinforced every so often, but I fell on the concrete with these and slide about 6 feet at a full sprint. I broke my arm, but these pants came away with two small tears. One on the  knee and one on the upper thigh. They are so small, they aren’t really noticeable. Didn’t break through the material and saved my leg. I wear these daily and I highly recommend them to everyone!!!

评论详情: Best cargo pants I've ever owned. I own several colors of tactical, multi pocketed ones in different colors and they're my daily wear. 评论概述: Warning they don’t stretch when belt is tight.
评论详情: Fatal flaw with the pants, they stretch whenever there is no belt, but when you put your belt on and tighten it up, it renders the stretch mechanism not usable, this is because the entire pant waist does not stretch instead there is a strange flap inside that stretches, but once the belt is tight, it will not stretch. I am returning these.

I am incredibly frustrated and disappointed with 5.11. They have almost certainly lost a professional customer.  I ordered a pair of Stryke pants, in Ranger Green, to use as part of my Law Enforcement duty uniform. This order was purchased during 5.11’s law enforcement appreciation event. However, the Stryke pants I received are too short. They were about 1.5-2" shorter than every other Stryke pants I own (in the same size). I have about 15 pair of Stryke pants, and it seems that every 4-5 pair I get one that is unusually short. It is ridiculous that their QC is that bad, or their products have that much variance. However, due to that, I typically purchase 5.11 pants at my local 5.11 store so I can find the correct length, but none of the stores ever have the Stryke pants in Ranger Green in stock.  I contacted 5.11’s customer service regarding the issue. I was sent a link to return the pants, instructed to select fitment issue, and in the notes write that I needed to exchange the pants, and the size that I wanted. I did that, and sent the pants back. I even included the same note with the pants, to ensure there was not any misunderstanding. When 5.11 received the pants, they processed them as a return, and refunded my money. I never asked for a refund, I need the pants for a duty uniform, and only needed a different size.  Again, I contacted 5.11’s customer service, who has been completed unhelpful. I have been informed that there is nothing 5.11 is willing to do to properly resolve the issue. I was told that I would just need to repurchase the pants. I was provided a discount code to use, but the code would still result in the pants costing more than the original price I paid, and I would have to pay shipping again. Customer service has also refused to escalate the issue to anyone at a higher level that may be able to resolve the issue, after asking them to do so.  Expecting me to pay more for the item + shipping, for their mistake, is just ridiculous. Especially for pants that were clearly defective to begin with.  All I expected was for 5.11 for send me the correct size pants. I will be sure to share this level of service with my 6000 person agency, including our uniform supply manager who recently began ordering V.XI gear (which is terrible by the way) for my unit and several others. The Crye Precision gear is looking much more appealing now, as they have always had outstanding customer service. I guarantee an issue like this would not occur with them.  If this is the level of customer service we can now expect from 5.11, I will transition to one of their competitors for my uniform and gear needs.

评论概述: 5.11 Tactical Pants Navy Blue Used Pants
评论详情: I ordered new pants Navy Blue 5.11 Tactical Pants size 36W/32L. - Pants received are 34W/32L. This is obvious when matched up with pants that are 34W/32L ordered years ago. And do not match the second pants color charcol that are actually 36W/32L. - Pants received were obviously used /pre-worn. - Pants felt unusually soft. As if removed from the dryer. Not the slightly stiffness of actual new pants. This was noticed immediately when removed from bag. - The pants smelled of laundry detergent. And not the typical light industrial type smell of new pants - The small black size tag on the back of the inner waist band was removed. The evidence of material can still be seen in the stitching. - The inner pants white wash instruction label is rolled as it would be when worn for a period of time. I physically received the pants today. Since the pants could not be delivered to me directly. So I had them sent to my US address where my sister can then have it shipped to my current location overseas. I am currently assigned overseas. Traveling performing Quality inspections and audits to aeroapace factories. I am extremely upset because I paid $82.00 for pre-worn/ used pants that are wrong size. Thank you so much. As a quality inspector. It is obvious that quality does not matter at the makers of 5.11 pants and Amazon.

评论概述: Color doesn't match the picture! And not the brand isn't as impressive as they once were.
评论详情: I ordered the Tundra color which in the pictures looks like a dark stone khaki sort of color. Nope it's green, a dark green but it's still green. The pants are also a little tight around the thighs. I know 5.11 doesn't care about their confusing color scheme, if they did they would all the same color of Tundra for all their pants, but they don't. That said, I do think it is a little silly to have such small thighs on these pants. People with a 36' inseam are going to have large thighs because they are tall. I'm 6'7 and sitting down in these pants can be awkward. Overall, while I might buy the brand again simply because they are one of the few that carry my inseam and waist size, I won't be happy about it. I honestly feel like I wasted my money on this purchase. Very disappointed.

评论概述: Ripped quickly. Zipper broke. Too pricey for the quality.
评论详情: I bought these because I was told they were top of the line wear for security personnel. I paid WAY too much considering the crotch began tearing after 2 months of wear. The zipper broke after repairing it twice at the 7 month mark. The crotch has been patched 5 times in several places (crotch, thighs, and seat of the pants).  I had high hopes about 5.11 pamts since they're brand name. But it seems these are no better than basic store brand clothes.  Good parts (there's not many): there are enough pockets and they are large enough to carry my required items. The belt loops hold up to wearing a velcro duty belt (which can't be said for many pants). The fabric seems strong everywhere else except for where it's really needed (crotch, seat of pants, thighs).  I will update the review once a customer service rep contacts me. Otherwise, would not recommend unless they cost $20-$35.

评论概述: An Inch Longer Than Advertised, Otherwise a Great Product
评论详情: These are great pants. I use them for casual wear, when I'm at the office, when I'm gardening, or working on the car. Just good, solid, practical pants. I have a 5.11 store 10 minutes away and usually buy clothes there. This time, I figured on taking an errand out of the drive time and just ordering from AMZ. Unusually, the set I ordered from AMZ was an inch too long. If you check the photos, the black Strykes are 36x30. I bought these at the 5.11 store. The stone colored ones are also tagged as 36x30 and were purchased through AMZ. But placed side by side, the stone colored ones are an inch longer. The fit at the waist line and thigh are correct and (subjectively) the same as the black Strykes. Sort of strange.  I would have sent them back but didn't check the length until after I'd taken the tags off. My bad. Make sure to check the length against existing (same style) 5.11 pants if you have them.

I recently purchased 5.11 Tactical Men's Stryke Operator Uniform Pants w/Flex-Tac Mechanical Stretch, Style 74369. I wore them for the first time today. I squatted down to pick up my small dog, and they started to split in the buttocks.

I have been purchasing pants from 511 for the last 7 years. I have tried several different styles and I keep coming back to these stryke pants. They are super comfortable, incredibly durable, have a nice flex in the material and there's not a single thing I would change about them. They are a bit pricey compared to the other pants but they last so long it's worth every penny.
